  2. OpenAI’s Sam Altman and Thrive Global’s Arianna Huffington want to share the 'miracle drug' to extend human life  Fortune
  3. Altman, Huffington launching AI health coach  The Hill
  4. OpenAI and Arianna Huffington are working together on an “AI health coach”  The Verge
  5. The Prompt: Sam Altman Wants You To Have An AI-Powered Health Coach  Forbes

item.title: Moroccan AI Influencer Kenza Layli Wins Inaugural Miss AI Beauty Pageant - Bitcoin.com News
item.description:
1. Moroccan AI Influencer Kenza Layli Wins Inaugural Miss AI Beauty Pageant  Bitcoin.com News
  2. World’s first Miss AI crowned — and she’s a hijab-wearing activist from Morocco ‘genuinely excited’ for the win  New York Post
  3. Meet Kenza Layli from Morocco - the winner of the world's first Miss AI beauty pageant  Euronews
  4. First “Miss AI” contest sparks ire for pushing unrealistic beauty standards  Ars Technica
  5. Influencer From Morocco Crowned World's First Miss AI, Gets $20,000 Prize  NDTV
